content.text: is designed to handle the transfer and update of billing data from a manual billing upload process into the main billing tables within a Microsoft SQL Server database. It processes billing adjustments and original bills, updating or inserting records into
tables. The procedure ensures that billing data is accurately reflected in the system, maintaining referential integrity and updating necessary fields based on the billing period and utility company.

The procedure is complex due to its extensive logic for handling billing adjustments, multiple table updates, and inserts. It involves conditional logic, joins, and subqueries, making it intricate to understand and maintain. The procedure also includes historical updates and modifications, adding to its complexity.
: Represents the billing period for which the data transfer is being processed.
: The ID of the authenticated user executing the procedure, used for auditing purposes.
: The unique identifier for the utility company associated with the billing data.
: An output parameter used to indicate the status of the procedure execution (e.g., success or failure).
: Sets the initial status to 9, indicating the start of the process.
: Inserts new original and adjustment records into
: Checks if there are unprocessed records and inserts them into
: Updates sequence IDs to maintain referential integrity between
: Sets the status to 0 upon successful completion.
: Ensure that the tables involved have appropriate indexes to optimize join operations and WHERE clause conditions.
: Consider processing large data sets in batches to reduce transaction size and lock contention.
: The procedure lock tables for extended periods, impacting concurrent operations. Implementing row-level locking or using snapshot isolation mitigate this.
: Regularly review and optimize the execution plan to ensure efficient query performance.
: The procedure assumes that data in
is accurate and complete. Any discrepancies could lead to incorrect billing records.
: Simultaneous execution of this procedure by multiple users could lead to deadlocks or data inconsistencies.
: The procedure lacks explicit error handling, which could result in unhandled exceptions and incomplete transactions.
: As the volume of billing data grows, the procedure may become a performance bottleneck without optimization.
: The complexity and historical modifications make the procedure challenging to maintain and extend. Regular code reviews and documentation updates are necessary.

--****************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
--	Author: MOHAMMED BELARREM
-- Description: 
--	Notes:		
--	Log: 
--	Creation 02/XX/2009
--	Update   08/04/2009 MOH : I updated the section that inserts the AccountBilling records to reflect the correct OriginalBilledAmount and OriginalBilledAmountPaid
--						  this was necessary after the new credit changes to the other upload processing procedures 
--	Update   01/13/2010 MOH : I changes AccountStatus to AccountBillingStatus 
--	Update   03/03/2010 MOH : added ActualOrEstimated, NetDollarChange, NetEnergyUsageChange and NetDemandUsageChange to the AccountBilling table and had to include the changes 
--	Update   03/22/2010 MOH : added the following fields LatePaymentAmount, CreditTransfer and PreviousAccountBalance
--	Update   10/29/2010 MOH : added FireAuditTrigger to the tables
--	Update   07/01/2011 MOH : added the logic to handle ManualPaymentOverrideAmount based on summary or nun summary
--								if invoice is summary ManualPaymentOverrideAmount = ManualPaymentOverrideAmount ( as operator entered it)
--								if invoice is not summary and if ManualPaymentOverrideAmount <= 0 then ManualPaymentOverrideAmount = 0
--								else																   ManualPaymentOverrideAmount = Revised + netPaidAdjustment
--	Update	 07/06/2011	MOH	: added taxt field to the adjutment and AccountBillingPaperBill tables. this should help isolate taxes
--	Update	 09/09/2011	MOH	: revised the ManualPaymentOverrideAmount to follow the following logic
--							  if  the insert is an adjustment ( or backbill)								then ManualPaymentOverrideAmount = 0
--							  else 
--									when  ( SummaryBilling = 'Y' )											then ManualPaymentOverrideAmount = ManualPaymentOverrideAmount (from the sum of the actual bills)
--									when  ( SummaryBilling = 'N' and ( ManualPaymentOverrideAmount <= 0 ))	then 0
--									when  ( SummaryBilling = 'N' and ( ManualPaymentOverrideAmount > 0 ))	then TotalAmountDue  
--
--*	UPDATE	2017-08-11	ZD		[usp_UpdateUniqueSeqIDsForAllTables] SP is added at the end of the process
--     UPDATE  2019-01-18  VYupdated for UniqueAccountSeqID
--**************************************************************************************************************************************************************************** 
CREATE PROCEDURE [ManualBill].[usp_ManualBilling_TransferDataToAccountBilling] 
(
	@BillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6),
	@authenticatedID AS INT,
	@utilityCompany AS dbo.seqid,
	@Status AS INT  OUTPUT
)
AS 
BEGIN
	SET @Status = 9;
 
	--***************************************************************************************************
	-- we need to insert some sort of validation to make sure that these same accounts werent processed
	-- or rather, these same bills, since the same account can have multiple bills within the same period
	--***************************************************************************************************
	
	/************************************************************************************************
	1. Insert all new originals and adjustments into AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill
	*************************************************************************************************/
	INSERT INTO [Billing].[AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill]
		([UploadManualBillingAccountAdjustmentSeqid]
		,[AccountSeqid]
		,[UniqueAccountSeqId] /* added on 1/18/2019 */
		,[AccountBillingSeqid]
		,[AccountBillingPaperBillSeqid]
		,[UtilityCompanySeqid]
		,[InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid]
		,[OriginalAccountNumber]
		,[FacilityName]
		,[ServiceAddress]
		,[BillingPeriod]
		,[BillingPeriodRevision]
		,[AccountBillingStatus]
		,[AccountBillingpreviousStatus]
		,[AccountBillingStatusPeriod]
		,[NumberOfTransactions]
		,[NumberOfRebillTransactions]
		,[NumberOfCancelTransactions]
		,[FirstCanceledBillingPeriod]
		,[EstimatedOrActualBilling]
		,[InitialCancelFromDate]
		,[CurrentBillingToDate]
		,[NumberOfBillingPeriods]
		,[TotalBillingDaysRebilled]
		,[TotalRebilledAmount]
		,[TotalCanceledAmount]
		,[PriorRevisedBilledAmount]
		,[RevisedBilledAmount]
		,[CanceledBilledAmount]
		,[PriorRevisedCCF]
		,[RevisedCCF]
		,[CanceledCCF]
		,[PriorRevisedEnergy]
		,[RevisedEnergy]
		,[CanceledEnergy]
		,[PriorRevisedDemand]
		,[RevisedDemand]
		,[CanceledDemand]
		,[BillingDays]
		,[BillingDate]
		,[ToDate]
		,[FromDate]
		,[BillingAction]
		,[ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod]
		,[CommodityRate]
		,[TotalCCF]
		,[TotalEnergy]
		,[TotalDemand]
		,[ThermsFactor]
		,[CancelFromDate]
		,[CancelToDate]
		,[CancelTotalCCF]
		,[CancelTotalEnergy]
		,[CancelTotalDemand]
		,[CancelThermsFactor]
		,[CancelBillingDays]
		,[ProcessEffectiveDate]
		,[DerivedFromSpannedBill]
		,[SpannedBillingPeriodRevision]
		,[SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod]
		,[SpannedBilledAmount]
		,[SpannedEnergy]
		,[SpannedDemand]
		,[SpannedCCF]
		,[SpannedThermFactor]
		,[SpannedMonthlyPercentage]
		,[SpannedTotalPercentage]
		,[BillCreationDate]
		,[PostMarkDate]
		,[DatePaymentDue]
		,[DateAcceptanceIntoOEC]
		,[billingCycle]
		,[SalesType]
		,[PaidAdjustmentAmount]
		,[EnergySource]
		,[LastPeriodModified]
		,[IsTimeOfDayAccount]
		,[ManualDataEntry]
		,[ManualPaymentOverride]
		,[ManualPaymentOverrideAmount]
		,[DiscountedAmount]
		,[DiscountPercentage]
		,BillTotalAmountDue
		,BillCreditedAmountPaid
		,BillCreditedAmountDate
		,LatePaymentAmount 
		,Tax
		,CreditTransfer
		,PreviousAccountBalance
		,[Notes]
		,FireAuditTrigger
		,[AuthenticatedUserID]
		,[DateAdded]
		,[LastUpdate])
	SELECT
		[UploadManualBillingAccountAdjustmentSeqid]
		,[AccountSeqid]
		,[UniqueAccountSeqID] /* added on 1/18/2019 */
		,[AccountBillingSeqid]
		,[AccountBillingPaperBillSeqid]
		,[UtilityCompanySeqid]
		,[InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid]
		,[OriginalAccountNumber]
		,[FacilityName]						---	[FacilityName]
		,[ServiceAddress]					---	[ServiceAddress]
		,[BillingPeriod]						--- [BillingPeriod]
		,[BillingPeriodRevision]				---	[BillingPeriodRevision]
		,[AccountBillingStatus]				---	[AccountBillingStatus]
		,[AccountBillingpreviousStatus]		---	[AccountBillingpreviousStatus]
		,[AccountBillingStatusPeriod]		---	[AccountBillingStatusPeriod]
		,[NumberOfTransactions]				---	[NumberOfTransactions]
		,[NumberOfRebillTransactions]		---	[NumberOfRebillTransactions]
		,[NumberOfCancelTransactions]		---	[NumberOfCancelTransactions]
		,[BillingPeriodRevision]				---	[FirstCanceledBillingPeriod]
		,[EstimatedOrActual]					---	[EstimatedOrActualBilling]
		,[InitialCancelFromDate]				---	[InitialCancelFromDate]
		,[CurrentBillingToDate]				---	[CurrentBillingToDate]
		,[NumberOfBillingPeriods]			---	[NumberOfBillingPeriods]
		,[TotalBillingDaysRebilled]	---	[TotalBillingDaysRebilled]
		,TotalRebilledAmount					---	[TotalRebilledAmount]
		,TotalCanceledAmount					---	[TotalCanceledAmount]
		,PriorRevisedBilledAmount			---	[PriorRevisedBilledAmount]
		,RevisedBilledAmount					---	[RevisedBilledAmount]
		,CanceledBilledAmount				---	[CanceledBilledAmount]
		,PriorRevisedCCF						---	[PriorRevisedCCF]
		,RevisedCCF							---	[RevisedCCF]
		,CanceledCCF							---	[CanceledCCF]
		,PriorRevisedEnergy					---	[PriorRevisedEnergy]
		,RevisedEnergy						---	[RevisedEnergy]
		,CanceledEnergy						---	[CanceledEnergy]
		,PriorRevisedDemand					---	[PriorRevisedDemand]
		,RevisedDemand						---	[RevisedDemand]
		,CanceledDemand						---	[CanceledDemand]
		,BillingDays							---	[BillingDays]
		,BillingDate							---	[BillingDate]
		,ToDate								---	[ToDate]
		,FromDate							---	[FromDate]
		,BillingAction						---	[BillingAction]
		,ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod			---	[ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod]
		,null								---	[CommodityRate]
		,TotalCCF							---	[TotalCCF]
		,TotalEnergy							---	[TotalEnergy]
		,TotalDemand							---	[TotalDemand]
		,ThermsFactor						---	[ThermsFactor]
		,CancelFromDate						---	[CancelFromDate]
		,CancelToDate						---	[CancelToDate]
		,CancelTotalCCF						---	[CancelTotalCCF]
		,CancelTotalEnergy					---	[CancelTotalEnergy]
		,CancelTotalDemand					---	[CancelTotalDemand]
		,CancelThermsFactor					---	[CancelThermsFactor]
		,dbo.CalculateNumberOfBillingDays(CancelFromDate, CancelToDate)			---	[CancelBillingDays]
		,ProcessEffectiveDate				---	[ProcessEffectiveDate]
		,DerivedFromSpannedBill				---	[DerivedFromSpannedBill]
		,SpannedBillingPeriodRevision		---	[SpannedBillingPeriodRevision]
		,SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod	---	[SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod]
		,SpannedBilledAmount					---	[SpannedBilledAmount]
		,SpannedEnergy						---	[SpannedEnergy]
		,SpannedDemand						---	[SpannedDemand]
		,SpannedCCF							---	[SpannedCCF]
		,SpannedThermFactor					---	[SpannedThermFactor]
		,SpannedMonthlyPercentage			---	[SpannedMonthlyPercentage]
		,SpannedTotalPercentage				---	[SpannedTotalPercentage]
		,BillCreationDate					---	[BillCreationDate]
		,PostMarkDate						---	[PostMarkDate]
		,DatePaymentDue						---	[DatePaymentDue]
		,DateAcceptanceIntoOEC				---	[DateAcceptanceIntoOEC]
		,BillingCycle						---	[billingCycle]
		,SalesType							---	[SalesType]
		,PaidAdjustmentAmount				---	[PaidAdjustmentAmount]
		,EnergySource						---	[EnergySource]
		,BillingPeriod						---	[LastPeriodModified]
		,IsTimeOfDayAccount  				---	[IsTimeOfDayAccount]
		,ManualDataEntry						---	[ManualDataEntry]
		,ManualPaymentOverride				---	[ManualPaymentOverride]
		,ManualPaymentOverrideAmount			---	[ManualPaymentOverrideAmount]
		,null								---	[DiscountedAmount]
		,null								---	[DiscountPercentage]
		,TotalAmountDue						--- BillTotalAmountDue
		,CreditedAmountPaid					--- BillCreditedAmountPaid
		,CreditedAmountDate					--- BillCreditedAmountDate
   		,LatePaymentAmount					--- LatePaymentAmount
   		,Tax									--- Tax	
		,TotalCancellationCreditTransfer 	--- CreditTransfer
		,PreviousAccountBalance				--- PreviousAccountBalance
		,Notes								---	[Notes]
		,'N'									--- FireAuditTrigger
		,@authenticatedID     				---	[AuthenticatedUserID]
		,getdate()							---	[DateAdded]
		,getdate()							---	[LastUpdate])	 
	FROM ManualBill.UploadManualBillingAccountAdjustment

	/************************************************************************************************
	2. update Billing.AccountBilling with the new information FROM AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill
	*************************************************************************************************/
	UPDATE  Billing.AccountBilling
	SET LastPeriodModified				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriod
		,FromDate						= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.FromDate 
		,ToDate							= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ToDate
		,AccountBillingStatus			= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingStatus
		,PreviousAccountBillingStatus	= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingpreviousStatus
		,AccountBillingStatusCodePeriod = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingStatusPeriod
		,RevisedBilledAmount			= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedBilledAmount -- +isnull(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.DiscountedAmount,0)
		,AccountEnergyUsage				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedEnergy
		,AccountDemandUsage				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedDemand
		,BillingPeriodDays				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingDays
		,BillingAction					= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingAction
		,UploadFileSeqid				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBillSeqid
		,SplitFiscalYear				= dbo.IsFiscalYearSplit(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ToDate)
		,ChargeToFiscalYear				= dbo.CalculateFiscalYearIfSplit(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ToDate, 'T')
		,ChargeToPriorFiscalYear		= dbo.CalculateFiscalYearIfSplit(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ToDate, 'F')
		,ActualOrEstimated				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.EstimatedOrActualBilling
		,NetDollarChange				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedBilledAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.CanceledBilledAmount
		,NetEnergyUsageChange			= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedEnergy + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.CanceledEnergy
		,NetDemandUsageChange			= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedDemand + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.CanceledDemand
		,LastUpdate						= getdate()	
		,FireAuditTrigger				= 'Y'		
	FROM Billing.AccountBilling INNER JOIN
  Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill ON 
  Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
  Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
  Billing.AccountBilling.UtilityCompanySeqid = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.UtilityCompanySeqid
	WHERE (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod) AND 
  (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompany) AND 
  (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid  IN (SELECT InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid FROM Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup WHERE BillingType = 'M')) 
 
	/************************************************************************************************************
	3. update Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill with the new information FROM AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill
	*************************************************************************************************************/
	UPDATE	Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill
	SET 
			LastPeriodModified				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriod,
			AccountBillingPaperBillRowState = case when IsNull(AccountBillingPaperBillRowState,0)+1 > 1 then 2 else 1 end, 
			BilledAmount					= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedBilledAmount,
			TotalCCF						= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedCCF, 
			ThermsFactor					= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ThermsFactor,   
			TotalEnergyUsage				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedEnergy, 
			TotalDemandUsage				= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.RevisedDemand, 
			Notes							= Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.Notes,
			AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBillSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBillSeqid, 
			LastUpdate						= getdate(),
			FireAuditTrigger				= 'Y'
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill INNER JOIN
			Billing.AccountBilling ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod AND 
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingSeqid IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN
			Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill ON Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.BillingPeriod AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
	WHERE   (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompany) AND 
			(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid IN (SELECT InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid FROM Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup WHERE BillingType = 'M'))	
	
	-- At this point the Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill for the current period has indetified all of the adjustments or 
	-- original bill rows that do not exist in EC3.  The Billing.AccountBilling AccountBillingSeqid
	-- is null and the Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill AccountBillingPaperBillSeqid is null.
	declare @maxAccountBillingSeqid int
	declare @maxAccountBillingPaperBillSeqid int
	declare @HasAccountBillingInsertsBeenProcessed int

	select @maxAccountBillingSeqid = max(AccountBillingSeqid) from Billing.AccountBilling	
	select @maxAccountBillingPaperBillSeqid = max(AccountBillingPaperBillSeqid) from Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill	

	select  @HasAccountBillingInsertsBeenProcessed = count(*) from Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill
	where 
			AccountBillingSeqid is null 
			and	BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
			and UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompany
			and InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid IN (SELECT InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid FROM Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup WHERE BillingType = 'M')  
	
	-- if this occurs in the case of "isnull(@HasAccountBillingInsertsBeenProcessed,1)" then set the value to 0 and not process
	-- also if the count of the AccountBillingSeqid that are null is zero do not process since they have already been processed.
	--
	if (isnull(@HasAccountBillingInsertsBeenProcessed,0)<> 0)
	BEGIN
		/**************************************************************************************************
		Insert the remaining records from the AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill into the AccountBilling
		these should be the original bills from the current billing period
		**************************************************************************************************/
		INSERT INTO [Billing].[AccountBilling]
			([OriginalAccountNumber]
			,[AccountSeqid]
			,[UniqueAccountSeqid] /* added on 1/18/2019 */
			,[InvoiceTrackingSeqid]
			,[CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup]
			,[CurrentAccountBillingInvoiceContractBudgetLine]
			,[UtilityCompanySeqid]
			,[EnergySource]
			,[IsTimeOfDayAccount]
			,[LastPeriodModified]
			,[BillingCycle]
			,[SalesType]
			,[PreviousBillingPeriod]
			,[BillingPeriod]
			,[BillingPeriodRevision]
			,[NextMeterReading]
			,[NextBillingPeriod]
			,[FromDate]
			,[ToDate]
			,[AccountBillingStatus]
			,[PreviousAccountBillingStatus]
			,[ManualPaymentOverride]
			,[AccountBillingStatusCodePeriod]
			,[OriginalBilledAmount]
			,[RevisedBilledAmount]
			,[OriginalBilledAmountPaid]
			,[PaidAdjustmentAmount]
			,[TotalAmountDue]
			,[CreditedPaidAmount]
			,[CreditedPaidAmountDate]
			,[AccountEnergyUsage]
			,[AccountDemandUsage]
			,[OriginalEnergyUsage]
			,[OriginalDemandUsage]
			,[AccountEnergyUsage1]
			,[AccountDemandUsage1]
			,[ManualDataEntry]
			,[ProductionAndDeliveryTariff]
			,[BillingPeriodDays]
			,[BillCreationDate]
			,[PostMarkDate]
			,[BillingAction]
			,[DatePaymentDue]
			,[ManualPaymentOverrideAmount]
			,[DateAcceptanceIntoOEC]
			,[InitialPostingDate]
			,[UploadFileSeqid]
			,[SplitFiscalYear]
			,[ChargeToFiscalYear]
			,[ChargeToPriorFiscalYear]
			,[ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod]
			,ActualOrEstimated
			,NetDollarChange
			,NetEnergyUsageChange
			,NetDemandUsageChange
			,[Notes]
			,FireAuditTrigger
			,[AuthenticatedUserID]
			,[DateAdded]
			,[LastUpdate])
		SELECT
			OriginalAccountNumber							---	[OriginalAccountNumber]
			,AccountSeqid									--- [AccountSeqid]
			,UniqueAccountSeqID--- [UnqiueAccountSeqID], added on 1/18/2019
			,null											--- [InvoiceTrackingSeqid]
			,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid						--- [CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup]
			,null											--- [CurrentAccountBillingInvoiceContractBudgetLine]
			,UtilityCompanySeqid								--- [UtilityCompanySeqid]
			,EnergySource									--- [EnergySource]
			,IsTimeOfDayAccount								--- [IsTimeOfDayAccount]
			,BillingPeriod									--- [LastPeriodModified]
			,billingCycle									--- [BillingCycle]
			,SalesType										--- [SalesType]
			,( SELECT top 1  BillingPeriod from Billing.AccountBilling WHERE (OriginalAccountNumber = OriginalAccountNumber) and BillingPeriod < @BillingPeriod ORDER BY BillingPeriod DESC	)	--- [PreviousBillingPeriod]
			,BillingPeriodRevision							--- [BillingPeriod]
			,BillingPeriodRevision							--- [BillingPeriodRevision]
			,ToDate											--- [NextMeterReading]
			,dbo.CreateNextPeriod(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriod, BillingCycle)		--- [NextBillingPeriod]
			,FromDate										--- [FromDate]
			,ToDate											--- [ToDate]
			,AccountBillingStatus							--- [AccountBillingStatus]
			,AccountBillingpreviousStatus					--- [PreviousAccountBillingStatus]
			,ManualPaymentOverride							--- [ManualPaymentOverride]
			,AccountBillingStatusPeriod						--- [AccountBillingStatusCodePeriod]
			,case when BillingAction ='O' then IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0) else 0.00 end			--- [OriginalBilledAmount]
			,RevisedBilledAmount								--- [RevisedBilledAmount]
			--,case when BillingAction ='O' then  (case when (PaidAdjustmentAmount < 0)  then (-1)*PaidAdjustmentAmount  else  RevisedBilledAmount  end )  else 0.00 end 		--- [OriginalBilledAmountPaid]
			--,case when ( BillingAction ='O' and (PaidAdjustmentAmount < 0)) then (-1)*PaidAdjustmentAmount  when ( BillingAction ='O' and (PaidAdjustmentAmount >= 0)) then  IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0)  else 0.00 end 		--- [OriginalBilledAmountPaid]
			,case when BillingAction ='O' then  IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0) + IsNull(PaidAdjustmentAmount,0)  else 0.00 end 		--- [OriginalBilledAmountPaid]
			,IsNull(PaidAdjustmentAmount,0)							--- [PaidAdjustmentAmount]
			--,case when ( BillingAction ='O' and (PaidAdjustmentAmount < 0)) then (-1)*PaidAdjustmentAmount  when ( BillingAction ='O' and (PaidAdjustmentAmount >= 0)) then  IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0)  else 0.00 end + IsNull(PaidAdjustmentAmount,0)	--- [TotalAmountDue]
			,case when BillingAction ='O' then  IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0) + IsNull(PaidAdjustmentAmount,0)  else 0.00 end		--- [TotalAmountDue]
/*revise */			   --,case when ( BillingAction ='O' and (PaidAdjustmentAmount < 0)) then (-1)*PaidAdjustmentAmount  when ( BillingAction ='O' and (PaidAdjustmentAmount >= 0)) then  IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0)  else 0.00 end + IsNull(PaidAdjustmentAmount,0)	--- [CreditedPaidAmount]
/*revise */			   ,null											--- [CreditedPaidAmount]
/*revise */			   ,null											--- [CreditedPaidAmountDate]
			,RevisedEnergy									--- [AccountEnergyUsage]
			,RevisedDemand									--- [AccountDemandUsage]
			,RevisedEnergy									--- [OriginalEnergyUsage]
			,RevisedDemand									--- [OriginalDemandUsage]
			,null											--- [AccountEnergyUsage1]
			,null											--- [AccountDemandUsage1]
			,ManualDataEntry									--- [ManualDataEntry]
			,null											--- [ProductionAndDeliveryTariff]
			,BillingDays										--- [BillingPeriodDays]
			,BillCreationDate								--- [BillCreationDate]
			,PostMarkDate									--- [PostMarkDate]
			,BillingAction									--- [BillingAction]
			,DatePaymentDue									--- [DatePaymentDue]
			--,case when ( BillingAction ='O' and (PaidAdjustmentAmount < 0)) then (-1)*PaidAdjustmentAmount  when ( BillingAction ='O' and (PaidAdjustmentAmount >= 0)) then  IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0)  else 0.00 end + IsNull(PaidAdjustmentAmount,0)		--- [ManualPaymentOverrideAmount]	OLD version before factoring in the IBG sumary or not 
			--,case when ( SummaryBilling = 'Y' ) then Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount  when ( SummaryBilling = 'N' and ( Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount <= 0 )) then  0  else IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0) + IsNull(PaidAdjustmentAmount,0) end	--- [ManualPaymentOverrideAmount]
			, CASE when BillingAction = 'O' 
					THEN 
										
						case when ( SummaryBilling = 'Y' ) 
								then Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount  
								when ( SummaryBilling = 'N' and ( Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount <= 0 )) 
								then  0  
								else 
								IsNull(RevisedBilledAmount,0) + IsNull(PaidAdjustmentAmount,0) 
						end		
									
					ELSE
					    0.00				-- should be zero if an insert to a a period other than current
			END	
															--- [ManualPaymentOverrideAmount]
			,DateAcceptanceIntoOEC							--- [DateAcceptanceIntoOEC]
			,getdate()										--- [InitialPostingDate]
			,UploadManualBillingAccountAdjustmentSeqid		--- [UploadFileSeqid]
			,dbo.IsFiscalYearSplit (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ToDate)				--- [SplitFiscalYear]
			,dbo.CalculateFiscalYearIfSplit (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ToDate,'T')	--- [ChargeToFiscalYear]
			,dbo.CalculateFiscalYearIfSplit (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.ToDate,'F')	--- [ChargeToPriorFiscalYear]
			,'N'												--- [ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod]
			,EstimatedOrActualBilling						--- ActualOrEstimated
			,0												--- NetDollarChange
			,0												--- NetEnergyUsageChange
			,0												--- NetDemandUsageChange
			,Notes											--- [Notes]
			,'N'												--- FireAuditTrigger
			,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AuthenticatedUserID								--- [AuthenticatedUserID]
			,getdate()										--- [DateAdded]
			,getdate()										--- [LastUpdate]
		from Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill
			INNER JOIN Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup
			ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid = Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid
		where AccountBillingSeqid is null  
				and BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod 
				and UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompany
				and Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid IN (SELECT InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid FROM Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup WHERE BillingType = 'M')  

		/************************************************************************************ 
		insert the same information into AccountBillingPaperBill
		*************************************************************************************/
		INSERT INTO [Billing].[AccountBillingPaperBill]
			([AccountBillingSeqid]
			,[AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBillSeqid]
			,[UtilityCompanySeqid]
			,[InvoiceBillingGroupSeqid]
			,[AccountSeqid]
			,[UniqueAccountSeqId] /* added on 1/18/2019 */
			,[OriginalAccountNumber]
			,[LastPeriodModified]
			,[BillingPeriod]
			,[BillingPeriodRevision]
			,[AccountBillingPaperBillRowState]
			,[CommodityTariffRate]
			,[CommodityTariffEffectiveDate]
			,[BillCreationDate]
			,[PostMarkDate]
			,[DatePaymentDue]
			,[DateAcceptanceIntoOEC]
			,[EnergySource]
			,[BilledAmount]
			,[TotalEnergyUsage]
			,[TotalDemandUsage]
			,[TotalCCF]
			,[ThermsFactor]
			,[LevelPaymentPlan]
			,[DiscountedAmount]
			,[DiscountPercentage]
			,[PreviousAccountBalance]
			,BillTotalAmountDue
			,BillCreditedAmountPaid
			,BillCreditedAmountDate 
			,LatePaymentAmount 
			,Tax
			,CreditTransfer
			,[Notes]
			,FireAuditTrigger
			,[AuthenticatedUserID]
			,[DateAdded]
			,[LastUpdate])
		select 
			AccountBillingSeqid							--- [AccountBillingSeqid]
			,AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBillSeqid		--- [AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBillSeqid]
			,UtilityCompanySeqid							--- [UtilityCompanySeqid]
			,InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid					--- [InvoiceBillingGroupSeqid]
			,AccountSeqid								--- [AccountSeqid]
			,UniqueAccountSeqid  --- [UniqueAccountSeqID] added on 1/18/2019
			,OriginalAccountNumber						--- [OriginalAccountNumber]
			,BillingPeriod								--- [LastPeriodModified]
			,BillingPeriodRevision						--- [BillingPeriod]
			,BillingPeriodRevision						--- [BillingPeriodRevision]
			,1											--- [AccountBillingPaperBillRowState]
			,null										--- [CommodityTariffRate]
			,null										--- [CommodityTariffEffectiveDate]
			,BillCreationDate							--- [BillCreationDate]
			,PostMarkDate								--- [PostMarkDate]
			,DatePaymentDue								--- [DatePaymentDue]
			,DateAcceptanceIntoOEC						--- [DateAcceptanceIntoOEC]
			,EnergySource								--- [EnergySource]
			,RevisedBilledAmount							--- [BilledAmount]
			,RevisedEnergy								--- [TotalEnergyUsage]
			,RevisedDemand								--- [TotalDemandUsage]
			,RevisedCCF									--- [TotalCCF]
			,ThermsFactor								--- [ThermsFactor]
			,'N'											--- [LevelPaymentPlan]
			,0.00										--- [DiscountedAmount]
			,0.00										--- [DiscountPercentage]
			,PreviousAccountBalance						--- [PreviousAccountBalance]
			,BillTotalAmountDue							---	BillTotalAmountDue
			,BillCreditedAmountPaid						---	BillCreditedAmountPaid
			,BillCreditedAmountDate						---	BillCreditedAmountDate 
			,LatePaymentAmount							--- LatePaymentAmount
			,Tax											--- Tax	
			,CreditTransfer								--- CreditTransfer
			,Notes										--- [Notes]
			,'N'											--- FireAuditTrigger
			,AuthenticatedUserID							--- [AuthenticatedUserID]
			,getdate()									--- [DateAdded]
			,getdate()									--- [LastUpdate]
		from Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill
		where AccountBillingSeqid is null  
				and BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod 
				and UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompany
				and InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid IN (SELECT InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid FROM Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup WHERE BillingType = 'M')

		-- The Billing.AccountBilling and the Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill rows have been inserted and their sequence ids were created.
		-- The two tables are joined to update the sequence id of the the Billing.AccountBilling in the the Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill table. 
		-- It inforces the referential integrity between the two tables.

		/************************************************************************************ 
		update the seqids in AccountBillingPaperBill and AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill
		*************************************************************************************/
		UPDATE  Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill
		SET   AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid
		FROM	
			Billing.AccountBilling INNER JOIN
			Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill ON Billing.AccountBilling.OriginalAccountNumber = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.OriginalAccountNumber AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.InvoiceBillingGroupSeqid AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.BillingPeriod AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision INNER JOIN
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill ON 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.OriginalAccountNumber = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.OriginalAccountNumber AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid
		WHERE
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingSeqid is null  
			and Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod 
			and Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompany
			and Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid IN (SELECT InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid FROM Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup WHERE BillingType = 'M')  

		UPDATE  Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill
		SET	AccountBillingSeqid			= Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid
			,AccountBillingPaperBillSeqid	= Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.AccountBillingPaperBillSeqid
		FROM	
			Billing.AccountBilling INNER JOIN
			Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill ON Billing.AccountBilling.OriginalAccountNumber = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.OriginalAccountNumber AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.InvoiceBillingGroupSeqid AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.BillingPeriod AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision INNER JOIN
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill ON 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.OriginalAccountNumber = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.OriginalAccountNumber AND 
			Billing.AccountBilling.CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid
		WHERE	
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.AccountBillingSeqid IS NULL
			and Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
			and Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompany
			and Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid IN (SELECT InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid FROM Billing.InvoiceAccountGroup WHERE BillingType = 'M');
	END;

	SET @Status = 0;
 
	-- This Stored Procedure is added to integrate Uniqueaccountseqid and uniquemeterseqid update
	-- EXEC [Common].[usp_UpdateUniqueSeqIDsForAllTables]
END;
